dc:description: Miniature flask.  Free blown of transparent greenish blue glass.  Globular body flattened at bottom and shoulder.  Body decorated with two rows of cut oval facets.  Circular ridge cut around top of shoulder.  Wide, slightly flaring neck cut into multiple, lightly cut facets.  Rim plain and flat.  Bubbles and black impurities in glass.  Small chip in rim.
Cf. Carboni  p.147 cat. 1.16a; Lamm p. 162, Pl. 60 #6.
